# cmccloudv2_volume_attachment (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_volume_attachment" "volume_attachment1" {
    volume_id 				= "b116eaac-129c-4e45-9c66-f3e1297b5f5b"
    server_id 				= "85ba4449-f4ad-4272-878b-51e93c218321"
    delete_on_termination 	= false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `server_id` (String) The ID of the Server to attach the Volume to
- `volume_id` (String) The ID of the Volume to attach to an server

### Optional

- `delete_on_termination` (Boolean) Whether to delete the volume when the server is deleted
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
